archimate:DataObject.name: LoyaltyProgramProdSpec
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A LoyaltyProgramProdSpec is a type of AtomicProductSpecification; is packaged through ProductOffering and is instantiated in the same manner in the installed base (LoyaltyProgramProduct that is a type of ProductComponent). A LoyaltyProgramProdSpec defines one or more LoyaltyRules that have to be checked in order to identify the actions to apply.
